messages.message: Hey, I also noticed now that validations are in a separate tab to schema that if you forget to save fields, the fields you have created do not appear in the validations dropdown. There is no error message or save fields button on this tab so its easy to get confused why its not working

the plan is to GA autosave soon, which would eliminate the need to save fields before switching to the validations tab

i know we’re fixing other issues with autosave rn, but that’s the plan!

cc @Arjun
